title: Help !!!!
body: Hi today I was downloading  LoL and accidently I suspended a instalation and I couldnt figure a way to run it again can you help me ??

replies.body: Oh no, that's concerning!  What happens if you try to run the installer again?  It should open the patcher, but it would likely be restarting the installation all over again.  If it's not coming up at all, try a PC restart in case something crashed in the background.  I hope that helps!
